section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: "Long-term care facility" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 7-701.01(7).
"Long-term care services" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 7-701.01(7A).

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-238: § 4 of D.C. Law 22-238 provided that the creation of this section by § 2 of D.C. Law 22-238 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-238: § 4 of D.C. Law 22-238 provided that the creation of this section by § 2 of D.C. Law 22-238 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
Applicability of D.C. Law 22-238: § 7159 of D.C. Law 23-16 repealed § 4 of D.C. Law 22-238. Therefore the creation of this section by D.C. Law 22-238 has been implemented.
